backend/main.mo: Actor entry point that imports and runs migration logic and mixes in blob storage functionality.
backend/migration.mo: Defines persistent data types for content and partners and provides a no-op migration from the old actor state to an empty new state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with a features array placeholder.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend files, their roles, and functionality in the project.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry document that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all site sections within the I18nProvider.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Animated About section rendering logo, translated title, four paragraphs, and a banner image.
frontend/src/components/ExportPackageGen: Generates downloadable HTML, CSS, JS, and README export files with translated content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Animated footer showing EU logo, disclaimer text, and copyright notice using translations.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with navigation, smooth scrolling, and language switcher for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, Erasmus badge, project number, and tagline using translations.
frontend/src/components/ObjectivesSectio: Animated objectives grid rendering six translated objective cards with icons.
Renders a partners section showing partner data with localized descriptions, logos, and scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/ResultsOutputsSe: Displays three project outputs with icons, localized text, and scroll-triggered card animations.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaSecti: Shows a grid of social media links with icons, localized text, and animated interactive cards and buttons.
frontend/src/components/TargetGroupsSect: Renders three target group cards with images, localized titles and descriptions, and scroll animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, initializing access control and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Simple hook exposing the actor and fetch state from useActor for future backend query expansion.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: IntersectionObserver-based hook that marks elements visible when scrolled into view, with optional reduced-motion handling.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides a React context for language selection, loading/storing the choice in localStorage and exposing a translation function.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the translation types and English/Danish dictionary used by the i18n system.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a simple hook that returns the i18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables plus custom animations and scroll effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and theming, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, and known issues for the React/Tailwind + IC backend project.
